div.p: I don’t really find anything difficult about it to be honest, probably when you’ve got like loads of work coming in and you’ve got to try and
manage it all and get it all done for a certain deadline that’s probably the hardest thing but the work itself I generally enjoy it
so as a result of that I think it’s quite easy. I think at times people can get quite, it can get quite stressful in an office because obviously
you’re in close proximity to a lot of people and I think sometimes their moods can sort of rub off on you a little bit but generally I really enjoy my job
there’s nothing I really don’t enjoy about it to be honest.
